method: Preheat the oven to 200C & whilst waiting for this to heat up, chop the chorizo & garlic into small chunks.
Place the chicken thighs in a large roasting tray.
Wash & then chop (leaving skin on) the potatoes into small chunks.
Chop the onion & peppers into similar sized chunks as  the potatoes & proceed to add all the veg (potatoes, onions & peppers) to the tray.
Pour over the chicken stock and sprinkle the chorizo & garlic evenly across the chicken & veg.
Cover in foil & pop into the oven for 30 minutes.
After 30 minutes, remove the foil & put back into the over for a further 30 minutes until the chicken and veg are cooked through.
Whilst this is in the oven, slice the chilli & halve the lemon & once the dish is cooked sprinkle over the chilli and juice of the lemon and ready to serve with rice/salad/veg!
